channel.title: The Recipe Critic on Brayden's Recipes

item.title: Better than Takeout Ham Fried Rice
item.description: Source: The Recipe Critic Ingredients 1Â½ cups- 2 cups chopped ham 3 cups cooked rice 2 Tbs sesame oil 1 small white onion, chopped 1 cup frozen peas and carrots, thawed 2-3 Tablespoons soy sauce (more or less to taste) 3 eggs, lightly beaten 2 Tbsp chopped green onions (optional) Directions Preheat a large skillet or wok to medium heat. Pour sesame oil in the bottom. Add white onion, chopped ham, peas and carrots and fry until tender.
